title: Urgent!!- Research Analyst-Permanent WFH
job_overview:
We are looking for highly motivated and hard-working candidates to fill the Full-Time position of Research Analyst.

We hire real-living people who have voices and who are willing to learn what you need for your career growth. We will not entertain applications that do not follow the instructions.

Home Office Requirements:
-Stable internet connection with at least 50 Mbps postpaid (must provide a screenshot of a speed test)
-Computer (at least 16GB RAM and Intel i5 core processor equivalent or up)
-Noise-Cancelling Headset
-Backup Internet Connection (Prepaid Home WIFI Router or Pocket WIFI) and Power Outage Backup
-Dual Monitor

Benefits:
-Monthly Company Bonus Program
-Paid Vacation Leave
-Holiday Bonus

Kindly send your application via our website - Upgrade to see actual infoeezy.hr/p/42876e490cbe-research-analyst
